person.persName: Samuel M. Boone (Danvile Attorney, 1st Regiment Kentucky Cavalry)

body.p: Born in 1837 in Kentucky. Danville Attorney. Married to Mary Boone. Children included G.C., Fannie, Lucinda, Lou W., Daniel, W.L., Samuel, ad Gilby K. Enlisted in First Kentucky Cavalry Regiment on August 1, 1861, as 2nd Lieutenant. Promoted to Captain, December 2, 1862. Resigned August 12, 1863.
